verses.verse: In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a fountain <S%H4726><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for sin <S%H2403><s%> and for uncleanness. <S%H5079><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of the idols <S%H6091><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and they shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> be remembered: <S%H2142><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> I will cause <S%H853><s%> the prophets <S%H5030><s%> and the unclean <S%H2932><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when <S%H3588><s%> any <S%H376><s%> shall yet <S%H5750><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> then his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> that begot <S%H3205><s%> him shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> live; <S%H2421><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou speakest <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> that begot <S%H3205><s%> him shall thrust him through <S%H1856><s%> when he prophesieth. <S%H5012><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that the prophets <S%H5030><s%> shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> of his vision, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2384><s%> when he hath prophesied; <S%H5012><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they wear <S%H3847><s%> a rough <S%H8181><s%> garment <S%H155><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> deceive: <S%H3584><s%>

But he shall say, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am no <S%H3808><s%> prophet, <S%H5030><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am a husbandman; <S%H376><s%> <S%H5647><s%> <S%H127><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> man <S%H120><s%> taught me to keep cattle <S%H7069><s%> from my youth. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%>

And one shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> wounds <S%H4347><s%> in <S%H996><s%> thine hands? <S%H3027><s%> Then he shall answer, <S%H559><s%> Those with which <S%H834><s%> I was wounded <S%H5221><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my friends. <S%H157><s%>

Awake, <S%H5782><s%> O sword, <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> my shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> the man <S%H1397><s%> that is my fellow, <S%H5997><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the shepherd, <S%H7462><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> shall be scattered: <S%H6327><s%> and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the little ones. <S%H6819><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that in all <S%H3605><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> parts <S%H6310><s%> therein shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> and die; <S%H1478><s%> but the third <S%H7992><s%> shall be left <S%H3498><s%> therein.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the third part <S%H7992><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> and will refine <S%H6884><s%> them as <S%H853><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> is refined, <S%H6884><s%> and will try <S%H974><s%> them as <S%H853><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> is tried: <S%H974><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> shall call <S%H7121><s%> on my name, <S%H8034><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will hear <S%H6030><s%> them: I will say, <S%H559><s%> It <S%H1931><s%> is my people: <S%H5971><s%> and they <S%H1931><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is my God. <S%H430><s%>
